MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow, affecting properties in Arran Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.27pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:32PM on Sunday 18 April 2021.
